summary: The module implements advanced beam‑search decoding for RNN‑Transducer speech models, offering multiple decoding strategies (standard, time‑synchronous, alignment‑length synchronous, and adaptive expansion) with configurable beam size, score normalization, hypothesis formatting, alignment handling, and optional n‑gram language model integration to balance speed, memory usage, and transcription accuracy.
business_intent: Enable accurate and efficient speech‑to‑text conversion for voice‑enabled products, transcription services, and other audio processing applications by providing a flexible, high‑performance decoding engine for RNNT models.
